onCanceled().Description: Called when the requested prompt was dismissed by the application.

onDismissed().Description: Called when the requested prompt was dismissed (not accepted) by the user.

Parameters: Throwable: a throwable representing the error.
onError(java.lang.Throwable).Description: Called when the requested prompt was dismissed because of a low-level error.

Parameters: byte: the data that was confirmed, see above for the format. This value must never be null.

ClassDesc: Callback class used when signaling that a prompt is no longer being presented.
